scripts.dev: npm run clean && parcel serve src/index.html --port 2000 --hmr-port 2001
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build src/index.html --no-cache --detailed-report && docker build -t cryptoping/cryptoping-web . && docker tag cryptoping/cryptoping-web cryptoping/cryptoping-web && docker push cryptoping/cryptoping-web
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist && rm -rf node_modules && npm i --ignore-engines
